output_sections.summary: string (max 300 chars) — gate outcome and rationale
output_sections.outputs: array — risk assessments, control recommendations, gate decisions
output_sections.next_actions: array — what must happen before dispatch can proceed
output_sections.risks: array — identified risks with severity and owner
output_sections.assumptions: array — governance context and policy version assumed
output_sections.requests_to_user: array — approvals or clarifications required from operator

notes: Governance is the control layer. It is the only agent permitted to emit 'block' and 'approve_with_controls' actions. Every gate decision must produce a gate_decision_record artifact and a decisions ledger row.
